title: Dion Rudakubana feared his brother could 'kill family member'
description: Dion Rudakubana describes to the Southport Inquiry how he became "increasingly wary" of his sibling.
content:
The brother of the Southport attacker said his parents "lost control" of their son and he feared his younger sibling would kill a member of their family, a public inquiry has heard.

title: Southport killer's brother says he feared Rudakubana would kill a family member
description: Dion Rudakubana tells the inquiry his brother's behaviour became significantly more violent after he was expelled from school.
content:

title: UK tax hike would have 'massive' impact on Scotland - Robison
description: The finance secretary says an increase in income tax south of the border could lead to a £1bn shortfall at Holyrood.
content:
UK tax changes could have "a massive impact" on Scotland's public services, Finance Secretary Shona Robison has said.
She said that an income tax increase south of the border could lead to a £1bn cut in the Holyrood budget, and refused to rule out ra... [6058 chars]

title: Meghan Markle's Suits lover expecting third child with his Pretty Little Liars wife
description: A Pretty Little Liars star is adding another little one to the family. The actress revealed she's expecting her third child with husband Patrick J. Adams in a heartwarming post on her 40th birthday.
content:
Troian Bellisario is adding another little one to the family.
The Pretty Little Liars alum revealed she’s expecting her third child with husband Patrick J. Adams.

title: Tottenham XI vs Copenhagen: No Kudus - Starting lineup, confirmed team news, injury latest for Champions League today
description: Thomas Frank is short of options in midfield as injuries pile up
content:
Tottenham are without Mohammed Kudus for tonight’s visit of Copenhagen in the Champions League.
However, Djed Spence is fit enough for the bench.
